Version: Info

Enter the missing data
Select Loan Type Differential Annuity
The loan amount for payment is divided into unequal parts, and the interest rate is charged on the balance of the loan body. The amount of the contribution remains unchanged The loan amount is evenly divided for the entire term, and interest is charged monthly on the remaining amount of money. The amount of the contribution in the graph is reflected in unequal values
Hint: More commonly used by banks
